title: The Good, The Bad, and the League: 3/14 - 3/20
body:
_Your weekly dose of server problem-os, NA League news, and other!_

Sylas continues to be the mage-of-all-trades-and-slightly-bugged, [Warmother ](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/comic/ashewarmother/issue-4/0/?utm_source=LeagueClient&utm_medium=OverviewTier2Pos1)launched issue #4, and most competitive leagues are wrapping up the Spring Split! 

**Follow-Ups:**

* Mac voice still not working properly.  Checking in on the issue from time to time for periodic updates
* Transfers are currently down

**Server Stuff: **

* **Automated alerts spike, causing MMR update delays (3/18, ~55 minutes)** A series of alerts on a database alert the NOC to possible delays with data transfers. Various data used by the client is taking too long to be stored and called by players. Teams on-call are paged to investigate, only to find the issue self-resolved before any investigation starts. 


**Game Stuff: **

* **Sylas R Micropatch (3/20, ~9 hours)** Some crazy interactions between Sylas stealing Teemo’s ult lead to Sylas being able to open an all you can eat mushroom buffet. The flipside though was, he basically could then never ult anyone else for the rest of the game. 

**Player Support Issues:**

We’re seeing a large spike in issues happening in-game.[ Update your graphics card drivers](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2) (there’s a new set from nVidia recently). If you still see problems in game (beyond, you know, Teemo existing as a thing), contact PS! 

_Morgageddon & Couch Commando _

replies.body:
A curious question - what's up with the account transfer service? Of all tools and features provided by the game, it's the one that always seems to be most often called out as being unavailable in the little (!) popup.

Is this a result of an API incompatibility across servers, or something else?
I'm getting an error right now that doesn't let me join queues and says something along the lines of "trouble fetching information". Is that what you are referring to in the server section?

> [{quoted}](name=Nefas,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=3907VM7x,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-21T22:41:09.679+0000)
>
> I'm getting an error right now that doesn't let me join queues and says something along the lines of "trouble fetching information". Is that what you are referring to in the server section?

No, this is tied to another issue.  A misconfiguration tied to the store was causing some to have matchmaking issues.  This should be resolved on 3/21.  Please let us know though if you are still seeing issues.
Love these, especially when I get to look up hilarious bugs I never knew existed. Thanks for the update!

My ban expired more than 20 minutes ago, but everytime I log in it still says Im banned. I already made a post but no response so I am trying here because I see the moderator responds. If you are online please help me. 

The link to my other post is this: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/LcQblYPX-ban-expired-still-banned

> [{quoted}](name=Fwlger,realm=EUNE,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=3907VM7x,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-03-23T22:21:07.329+0000)
>
> My ban expired more than 20 minutes ago, but everytime I log in it still says Im banned. I already made a post but no response so I am trying here because I see the moderator responds. If you are online please help me. 
> 
> The link to my other post is this: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/LcQblYPX-ban-expired-still-banned

I see that you are back in, so it looks like all is good.  Keep an eye on the timestamp of when your ban should be up.  Bans are lifted not only by a certain date, but by a certain time as well as the time zone given.  Hope all is good!
why does my game keep shuting off after 30 minutes saying im using a third party program when im not :( seen other posts about this happening to other people :c

I lost 17 LP earlier because the client decided to not log me into game, so I got an automatic loss for the remake.

Are you gonna give me back my 17 LP??

> [{quoted}](name=Dunkey Was Right,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=3907VM7x,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-03-22T00:15:33.890+0000)
>
> Having trouble joining queues.

Answered this [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/3907VM7x-the-good-the-bad-and-the-league-314-320?comment=00080000)

I played a 20 minute Ranked game and we were winning. All of a sudden the game crashes FOR EVERYONE in the game and doesn't let us reconnect to the game again. Guess what happened after, just like Custom games when everyone leaves the game the game gets deleted and I never got my LP.

> [{quoted}](name=Vení Vidi Vicì,realm=EUNE,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=3907VM7x,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-23T10:54:00.308+0000)
>
> I played a 20 minute Ranked game and we were winning. All of a sudden the game crashes FOR EVERYONE in the game and doesn't let us reconnect to the game again. Guess what happened after, just like Custom games when everyone leaves the game the game gets deleted and I never got my LP.

Sometimes, game servers will derp and completely freeze/lock up. If that happens, all games on it never complete and aren't stored. We track those as games that don't finish properly, and can see when the number of games starting over a set time period don't equal the games that end from the same active ids. 

Those, along with Ghost Games, are pretty rare occurrences. Sorry you had to run into one :(

Im on mac and my Que went and i push accept then it acts as if i decline i tried multiple time then it put me on a block for 6 min as if i declined queue pop! I am SURE I ACCEPTED! anyone else have this issue?

> [{quoted}](name=Gideon15,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=3907VM7x,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-03-21T22:49:46.215+0000)
>
> Im on mac and my Que went and i push accept then it acts as if i decline i tried multiple time then it put me on a block for 6 min as if i declined queue pop! I am SURE I ACCEPTED! anyone else have this issue?

When that happens, you most likely lost the packet of data from/to the server around actually clicking the button. If you're on WiFi, that's far more likely than if you're on a wired connection.
I'm having the same Error of "Trouble fetching information for (Account)" Is this problem something that's going to bar me from trying to play Ranked anytime soon? Rito pls
i have been kicked twice in a ranked because the Third party software unexpected error...im pretty sure i havent done anything like that. Can someone tell me if that is normal?
